segments.description: Wildcard characters (?, *, ~) can be used as comparison criteria for functions when searching.

Wildcard characterMatch
?Any single character
*Any number of characters
~ followed by ?, *, or ~?, *, or ~ character
Note: The wildcard can only be used in comparison strings that use equals (=); it cannot be used in comparisons that use the other operators (>,<,!=,<=,>=).
